attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Display details of car insurance on vehicle windscreens as well as road tax, discs. This is done in Jersey. This would then ensure that all drivers would be taxed and insured, before going on the road. No visible insurance details would ensure the possibility of an automatic fine and reassurance for other road users, in the event of an accident.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
